bill.summary:
Owyhee Wilderness Areas Boundary Modifications Act
This bill adjusts the boundaries of the North Fork Owyhee Wilderness, the Owyhee River Wilderness, and the Pole Creek Wilderness in Idaho to exclude certain land.
